actions.name: microsoft_sharepoint_copy_item_within_site
actions.description: Copy a file or folder to another folder within the same site.

actions.name: microsoft_sharepoint_copy_item
actions.description: Copy a file or folder from one site to another within the same tenant, with overwrite option.

actions.name: microsoft_sharepoint_create_folder
actions.description: Creates a new folder at path you specify.

actions.name: microsoft_sharepoint_create_list_item
actions.description: Creates a new item in a list.

actions.name: microsoft_sharepoint_delete_list_item
actions.description: Deletes an existing item from a list.

actions.name: microsoft_sharepoint_find_file
actions.description: Look up a file by its name or path.

actions.name: microsoft_sharepoint_get_folder_contents
actions.description: List all files and subfolders in a specified folder, optionally with detailed metadata.

actions.name: microsoft_sharepoint_get_site_information
actions.description: Fetch metadata of a SharePoint site (site ID, title, URL, description, etc.).

actions.name: microsoft_sharepoint_move_file
actions.description: Move a file from one folder to another within the same drive.

actions.name: microsoft_sharepoint_publish_page
actions.description: Publishes a SharePoint page, making it available to all users. If the page is checked out, it will be automatically checked in. Note: Pages with active approval flows will not publish until approval is complete.

actions.name: microsoft_sharepoint_search_list_item
actions.description: Finds a item in a list based on name.

actions.name: microsoft_sharepoint_update_list_item
actions.description: Updates an existing item in a list.

actions.name: microsoft_sharepoint_upload_file
actions.description: Uploads a new file at path you specify.

triggers.name: new_file_in_folder
triggers.description: Fires when a new file is created or added in a specific folder.

triggers.name: new_file_in_subfolders
triggers.description: Fires when a new file is added anywhere in the first-level subfolders of a folder. Note: This trigger will not monitor subfolders created after the flow is activated.

triggers.name: new_list_item
triggers.description: Triggers when a new item is created in a SharePoint list.

triggers.name: new_list
triggers.description: Triggers when a new list is created in a site.

triggers.name: new_or_updated_file
triggers.description: Triggers when a file is created or updated in a given folder.

triggers.name: new_or_updated_folder
triggers.description: Triggers when a folder is created or updated (e.g., name change).

triggers.name: new_or_updated_list
triggers.description: Triggers when a list is created or updated in a site.

triggers.name: updated_list_item
triggers.description: Fires when an existing item in a SharePoint list is updated.
